name: Party Poopers!
description:
Party Poopers!

Party Poopers is a Top-Down 3D Tower Defense Game where you place down extra-ordinary Penguins using their powers to stop the ravenous Polar bears trying to blow the candles out before the Birthday Penguin can!

Developed By:

- @BakerDev (me)

- @D_c_r https://itch.io/profile/d-c-r

Issues

Party Poopers had a fair amount of issues in its development, this had lead to many known bugs and outstanding issues, a few notable issues include the planned WebGL build failing due to a filesystem issue that we weren't aware of, balance is also a key issue although I do think it has gotten much better than it was originally, as well as the game being incredibly easy to just "cheese" and win easily using some unintended strategies but it's up to you if you wanna use them.

Known Bugs

  • You can place penguins on the area outside of the main ground base level.
  • Penguins can shoot through walls
  • Currently Machine Gun Penguins are only available if you have 200 Money

Though they may seem it both of the above mentioned bugs are not really game breaking and provide more of a disadvantage should you use them.

Notes

Some final notes to take away, this was mine and @D_c_r's second successful game jam and we started with around 72 Hours left on the clock as we knew we'd overscope with the full 7 days so I think we managed this quite well, I believe we both agree that we'll come back and fix some bugs in this game but are unlikely to come back to fully revamp anything or add extra levels, although never say never.

Tools We Used

Unity - The entire game runs on this

MagicaVoxel - Level Design and 3D Models

Aseprite - Any textures
